body: So if I divide by CUDNN_VERSION by 100 instead of 1000 and rename to cudnnCompatibilityVersion, would that be sufficient?
body_html: So if I divide by CUDNN_VERSION by 100 instead of 1000 and rename to cudnnCompatibilityVersion, would that be sufficient?
body_text: So if I divide by CUDNN_VERSION by 100 instead of 1000 and rename to cudnnCompatibilityVersion, would that be sufficient?
